transcript:
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir, namaste kaise ho?
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji namaste sir. Kumbal baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se, kaise ho?
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji boliye.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan sir woh sir humare mail kar diye the uske review rating ke liye, aapko pahucha tha mail?
Customer: Woh kaunsa wala?
Executive: Hello? Jo review rating ke liye mail tha aap Haan ji sir.
Executive: Hello? Haan review rating ke liye, haan sir awaaz aa rahi hai meri aapko?
Customer: Haan boliye boliye.
Executive: Haan woh review rating ke liye jo sir aap mail bole the Prabhat sir ne kar diye the ya nahi kiye the abhi?
Customer: Nahi abhi tak nahi kiya.
Executive: Nahi wohi toh isliye. Nahi sir aapke mail mail ID pe gaya hoga, ek second main bata de raha hu. Aap check kijiye.
Executive: Mail pe kiye honge ek second rukiye.
Customer: Bhaiya mere ko shaam ke pehle hi woh.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Baad baad mein phone kijiye tab woh rahega. Aapko baad mein phone kijiye bhaiya.
Executive: Achha theek hai main baat kitne baje kar lu sir aapko?
Customer: Shaam ko Hello? 6 baje kar lijiye. Shaam ko kar lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai, theek hai sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received review rating mail.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check and inform customer.

- Agreed to call back in the evening.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 6 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- review rating, mail, follow up
